actions.committee: House Committee on District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on District of Columbia.

official_title: A bill to amend the Domestic Relations Section of the District of Columbia Code.

summary.text: Provides, under the Domestic Relations Section of the District of Columbia Code, that the clerk of the Superior Court of the District shall examine applicants for marriage licenses under oath and shall ascertain the names and ages of such applicants, and if they are under age the names of their parents or guardians, whether they were previously married, and whether they are related or not, and if so, in what degree. Provides that false swearing in regard to such matters shall be deemed perjury.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Domestic Relations Section of the District of Columbia Code.
